name: Cartoon Racing Free
description:
With "Cartoon Racing", drive your SuperCar in a really Fun Cartoon environment!

Take the control of your Cartoon Car, on no less than 20 different tracks!
Improve your experience on each track and increases your XP!

Increase your Firepower and Boost your engine in the "Shop", available on the main menu!
Fasten your seatbelt and take the control of your Powerful Cartoon Car!
Avoid the Tornadoes! They make you lose control!
Get as max Rockets and aim well!

You have mastered acceleration, braking, steering and rockets!
Don't forget that: "Without control, Power is nothing!"

The tracks are very technical, I suggest you to start with the Help level to learn to control your car and use your bonus.
It's available on the Main Menu by clicking on "Help".
Follow the instructions and you will be ready to have fantastic sensations!

You can select the difficulty level, the Accelerometer sensibility, the Camera view and many more...

You also can choose the "Fight" Level and Try to be the only survivor!
In this level, there's no Limit.
Only one rule: IT MUST REMAIN ONE!

The time of each race is recorded.
Share your scores online and try to stay in the world ranking!
So you can compete with players around the World!
You can see the ranking board at any time by clicking on the logo "World High Scores".

Fabulous sensations await you!

Now, it's up to you!

••• Game Features •••

• 8 different Cartoon Cars!
• Total control of your Cartoon Car
• Full 3D Real Time Rendering
• 20 different tracks
• High graphic Quality!
• Really nice Cartoon environment!
• Customize your Cartoon Car
• Discovery Mode
• Nitro and Rocket Bonus
• Select the difficulty level
• Sets the Accelerometer sensibility
• Choose your Camera view
• Enter into the world rankings
